attributes.title: New Game+ #13
attributes.caption: The Glitches talk Xbox One X
attributes.description: So we definitely got our Xbox One X pre-orders. Did you? Are you looking forward to it or is it just another Xbox?

attributes.title: New Game+ #12
attributes.caption: The Glitches talk expectations
attributes.description: Ashley, Adam, and Side Glitch Ben dig into the mailbag. What games do you go back to repeatedly? Also, what expectations do you have on game genres?

attributes.title: New Game+ #11
attributes.caption: Gus opens Hearthstone packs
attributes.description: With the new Hearthstone expansion out Gus decides to open up some card packs. Let's see what he gets!

attributes.title: New Game+ #10
attributes.caption: The Glitches count their Steam libraries
attributes.description: How many games are in your Steam Library? Also what would get you to buy into a Kickstarter campaign?

attributes.title: New Game+ #9
attributes.caption: The Glitches Talk Smut
attributes.description: What's the smuttiest game we've ever played? We answer your mailbag questions, exclusively for Rooster Teeth FIRST members.

attributes.title: New Game+ #8
attributes.caption: Splatoon's Amiibo
attributes.description: Kdin brought in all the different Splatoon amiibo! Join Kdin, Adam, and Mica as they test the different amiibo to see what bonuses they offer in Splatoon 2.

attributes.title: New Game+ #7
attributes.caption: Should streaming audiences be able to affect your games?
attributes.description: Are games made better by streaming audiences having input or changing games on the fly?

attributes.title: New Game+ #6
attributes.caption: The mailbag is Interrupted by breaking Overwatch news!
attributes.description: This week we take a look in the ol' mailbaWAIT IS THAT A NEW OVERWATCH CHARACTER?!

attributes.title: New Game+ #5
attributes.caption: What's arcade culture in Japan like?
attributes.description: From a life changing air hockey table to claw games that are hard to understand, there's a lot going on in Japan's arcades.

attributes.title: New Game+ #4
attributes.caption: After E3, we discuss our most anticipated indie games!
attributes.description: Now that E3 has wrapped up what are the indie games everyone is looking forward to?

attributes.title: New Game+ #2
attributes.caption: GP talks about their first E3
attributes.description: Stolen identities, fake websites, espionage. Is this a political thriller or how you get into E3 for the first time?

attributes.title: New Game+ #1
attributes.caption: Lost to History
attributes.description: The Glitches take on a question from community member Fletch Love and discuss their favorite games that have been lost to time.

attributes.title: The Glitches Become Camp Counselors - #1
attributes.caption: GP Discusses Friday the 13th & E3 Predictions
attributes.description: Welcome to the first episode of the Glitch Please podcast from the fine folks at Rooster Teeth and The Know! In this first episode join Gus, Ashley, Adam, and Ryan as they discuss the newest games they've been playing, run through the news (0:21:43), deep dive into what works and doesn't work about Friday the 13th (0:50:51), and share their predictions for E3 (1:11:41). This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron and MVMT Watches

attributes.title: Bonus Episode: Let's Build A PC!
attributes.caption: The Glitches build a computer
attributes.description:
In this special episode of Glitch Please join Ashley, Gus, Adam, and Alfredo as they build a PC.
Shout out to Corsair and MSI for sending us most of the parts we need to put together a high-end gaming PC.

Here are the parts we used:
Motherboard: MSI Z370 GAMING PRO CARBON AC || 
GPU: MSI GeForce GTX 1080 Gaming X 8G || 
RAM: Corsair VENGEANCE® RGB 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4 DRAM || 
HDD: Corsair Force Series™ LE 480GB SATA 3 6Gb/s SSD || 
Cooling: Hydro Series™ H115i PRO RGB 280mm Liquid CPU Cooler || 
Fans: 1x Corsair LL Series LL140 RGB 140mm Dual Light Loop RGB LED PWM Fan 2 Fan Pack with Lighting Node Pro, 4x Corsair LL120 RGB 120mm Dual Light Loop RGB LED PWM Fan || 
Fan/Light Control: Corsair Commander PRO || 
Keyboard: Corsair K95 RGB PLATINUM Mechanical Gaming Keyboard || 
Mouse: Corsair GLAIVE RGB Gaming Mouse || 
Headset: Corsair VOID PRO RGB Wireless Premium Gaming Headset with Dolby® Headphone 7.1  || 
Case: Corsair Obsidian Series® 500D Premium Mid-Tower Case
attributes.display_title: Bonus Episode: Let's Build A PC!

attributes.title: Living The Dead Cells Life

attributes.title: Cross Play Lives!
